content.raw:
This does not check for SIGKILL along side EX_TEMPFAIL. I'm not sure if we still want to catch for this case. Are we sure that SIGKILL will only happen on an out of memory (ulimit) issue?

The simpleresubmit test has also been updated to correctly catch MemoryError issues with segway-task.
